## Constitutional Compliance (Estrella Rodriguez)

- [ ] CHK001 Educational design: Colorful, cheerful interface appropriate for children/young users
- [ ] CHK002 Vanilla web technologies: Only HTML5, CSS3, vanilla JavaScript used
- [ ] CHK003 Smooth animations: 60fps entrance/exit animations implemented
- [ ] CHK004 Responsive design: Works on mobile, tablet, and desktop
- [ ] CHK005 SEO excellence: Semantic HTML5, complete meta tags, sitemap
- [ ] CHK006 Performance: <3s load time, optimized images and animations

## Code Quality & Standards

- [ ] CHK007 Clean, well-commented, maintainable code
- [ ] CHK008 Proper HTML5 semantic structure and heading hierarchy
- [ ] CHK009 CSS organized into logical files (main, animations, responsive)
- [ ] CHK010 JavaScript modules properly structured and documented

## Accessibility & User Experience

- [ ] CHK011 WCAG 2.1 AA compliance verified
- [ ] CHK012 Proper alt text and accessibility attributes
- [ ] CHK013 Keyboard navigation support
- [ ] CHK014 Screen reader compatibility

## Testing & Validation

- [ ] CHK015 Cross-browser testing completed
- [ ] CHK016 Mobile device testing completed
- [ ] CHK017 Performance testing (<3s load time, 60fps animations)
- [ ] CHK018 SEO validation (meta tags, sitemap, structured data)
